Based on the preferences you've given me, I would recommend "City of Lost Souls". This movie stars Nicolas Cage and Jennifer Lawrence. The plot follows two teenagers who become friends after a series of coincidences. As they spend more time together, they begin to uncover some secrets about themselves and each other.
In terms of the actors, Nicolas Cage delivers a compelling performance as a man trying to come to terms with his own troubled past. Jennifer Lawrence is equally impressive in her portrayal of a young woman struggling to come to terms with some very difficult truths about herself and the world around her.
Overall, "City of Lost Souls" offers up an engaging and thought-provoking film that is sure to appeal to fans of this genre, as well as those looking for something more challenging but also rewarding on screen.
